********************************************************************************
Face Normal Force
********************************************************************************

Vertex forces are computed by applying a normal force to each face of the mesh. This contraint can be used to simulate inflatable structures.

.. figure:: /_images/face_normal_force.gif
    :figclass: figure
    :class: figure-img img-fluid

.. literalinclude:: ../../examples/meshsolver_face_normal_force.py
    :language: python
